app.description: Bam to fixedStep Wiggle converter. Parses the cigar String to get the depth. Memory intensive: must alloc sizeof(int)*size(chrom)

option.name: custom_track
option.description: print a UCSC custom track header

option.name: min_gap
option.description: minimal zero-coverage length before writing a new header

option.name: min_depth
option.description: minimal depth before setting depth to zero

app.documentation:
Example the input file bash java -jar dist/bam2wig.jar -w 1 -s 3 -i -t -L OFF examples/toy.bam
